oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Success factors in the development of farm vacation tourism
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Schulze, Holger
Sidali, Katia Laura
Spiller, Achim
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Policy environments and social economy
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Farm vacation tourism allows many families to fully use their domestic resources; furthermore it generates social benefits for the surrounding community. We have conducted a study to examine the success factors of this type of tourism. The results clearly demonstrate that one of the key components relies on the entrepreneurial skills of the farmer.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Schulze, Holger; Sidali, Katia Laura and Spiller, Achim (2007) Success factors in the development of farm vacation tourism. Poster at: Zwischen Tradition und Globalisierung - 9. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, Universität Hohenheim, Stuttgart, Deutschland, 20.-23.03.2007.
